Articles.Content:
> 
> Oh LOL, I just realized that I had accidentially removed the SQUAD and NASA stuff from Gamedata, hopefully the update will refresh those.

You dont need that old junk where this trains goin
Sweet mother of destiny's child! This train's speeding to ludicrous speeds!
I dunno about anyone else, but I slept just fine. 7AM's not even particularly early for me to wake up. Goodness, so much hype...
Anyone thinking 9am squad time?

> 
> Anyone thinking 9am squad time?

It is 9AM Squad time.

> 
> Aye Capt'n. HypePlaid factor 9.

Factor Nine!? You're out of your mind! That can only be achieved at 300 pages, at the moment of release!

> 
> Anyone thinking 9am squad time?

it's 9am squad time now

> 
> You dont need that old junk where this trains goin

I know. I did verify cache though just in case.
9am would be the soonest. I expect more around noon their time.

> 
> I think I'll do verify steam cache just in case.
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Is it me or do the thread posts keep shifting around a bit?

Happens when people post too quickly, the forum is trying to arrange everything properly based on timestamp.
I just hope us Europeans can play it today without having to go to bed at ludicrous hours ;\_;

34 pages to go!

Lets hype it up!
I kinda hope they release it later, because right now I'm in school, and I want this train to beat the all time record!

why squad make a countdown that no exact time?

It's quiet annoying ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

Keeping this tab open:

[http://kerbalx.com/countdown](http://kerbalx.com/countdown)

> 
> 9am would be the soonest. I expect more around noon their time.

i concur with that time estimate.

> 
> 34 pages to go!
> Lets hype it up!

Only 32 pages to go where no Hype Train has gone before.

> 
> Factor Nine!? You're out of your mind! That can only be achieved at 300 pages, at the moment of release!

Ye cannae change the laws of physics! We can do it! Increasing power to the structural integrity fields!

[https://twitter.com/maxmaps](https://twitter.com/maxmaps)

new post!!!!

> 
> Anyone thinking 9am squad time?

> 
> It is 9AM Squad time.

> 
> it's 9am squad time now

Let them finish their morning coffee. 9:15AM is my guess for release time

The hype is real!!!

![Vh3WVYY.png](http://i.imgur.com/Vh3WVYY.png)
Initiate the hype!

Looks like we still need more speed. We may have to engage the trans-plaid drive!

Happy landings!
